DynamicTokens.Name: ClintText1
DynamicTokens.Value: Oh... A... Are we on a date, then?$4^I guess it's 'girls night', huh? Does that mean I have to buy my own snacks?

DynamicTokens.Name: ClintText1
DynamicTokens.Value: I guess it's 'guys night', huh? Does that mean I have to buy my own snacks?^Oh... A... Are we on a date, then?$4

DynamicTokens.Name: ClintText2
DynamicTokens.Value: *whispers*...If you're, um... tired... you can put your head on my... my shoulder. Heh... or not!$4^It's just... *hic*... Joja Cola.$h

DynamicTokens.Name: ClintText2
DynamicTokens.Value: It's just... *hic*... Joja Cola.$h^*whispers*...If you're, um... tired... you can put your head on my... my shoulder. Heh... or not!$4

DynamicTokens.Name: ElliottText
DynamicTokens.Value: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, my dear?^Good evening. Did you have a productive day, @?

DynamicTokens.Name: ElliottText
DynamicTokens.Value: Good evening. Did you have a productive day, @?^Good evening. Did you have a productive day, my dear?

DynamicTokens.Name: SebastianText1
DynamicTokens.Value: Hey... maybe I'll take you for a ride some day.$8^Hey... Maybe I'll let you ride sometime, if you want.$8

DynamicTokens.Name: SebastianText1
DynamicTokens.Value: Hey... Maybe I'll let you ride sometime, if you want.$8^Hey... maybe I'll take you for a ride some day.$8

DynamicTokens.Name: SebastianText2
DynamicTokens.Value: I don't usually bring guys to this place... In fact, you're the only one.$l^Um... I've never... felt anything like this with another girl before... But you're different.$l

DynamicTokens.Name: SebastianText2
DynamicTokens.Value: Um... I've never... felt anything like this with another guy before... But you're different.$l^I don't usually bring girls to this place... In fact, you're the only one.$l

Entries.fall_Thu: #$1 AbigailHAND#Last night I dreamt that my left hand had turned into a gigantic %noun. Does that mean anything?#$e#%{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} doesn't seem to be interested in talking right now.

Entries.Bad_9: I wonder if I could've done better... I was very good friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} before we met. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}e was probably the one...$s

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} seems to be doing okay without me around.

Entries.Fri4: Hey, @. I'm glad you stopped by.#e#I'm not ashamed to say that I love my Grandma!#$e#Now Grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Grandpa:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}a, on the other hand...#$e#Just kidding.$h
Entries.winter_Tue: Hey, can you go find {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} and tell her I said 'hi'?
Entries.winter_Tue4: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?$l#$b#If you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}, tell her I'm busy.$l#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Haley: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.$9
Entries.winter_Sat: There's some weird people living in this town.#$e#...like that g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}. Why does {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e wear black all the time?#$e#I don't get it.

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? Cool.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.Tue: The beach is a cool place to hang out and soak up some rays.#e#You gotta spend some time in the sun or else you'll get all pale.#$e#Hey, do you wanna hang out with me at the beach some time? Do you have a swimsuit?^*sigh*... I wish there were more boys in this town, know what I mean?$s
Entries.Wed: Looks like a good day to play catch, huh?$u#$e#$q 5/6 Wed_01_old#If you weren't a boy I'd ask you to play catch.^I'd ask you to throw the ball around, but you don't really seem like the sports type.#$r 6 0 Wed_01_02#I'm fine just watching you from a distance.#$r 5 15 Wed_01_01#I want to play catch with you!#$r 5 0 Wed_01_03#(angry) What's that supposed to mean?
Entries.Sat: My arms are really sore, but that's the sign of progress for a girl like me.#e#I must've done a thousand push-ups yesterday.
Entries.summer_Tue: If my hair wasn't so popular with the boys, I swear I'd shave it all off in a second.#$e#*sigh*... Life can be tough.
Entries.summer_Wed: Hey farm guy, I've got a question for you.^Hey Farm girl, I've got a question for you.#$b#$q 52/53 summer_Wed_01_old#Do you think I'll ever turn pro?#$r 52 30 summer_Wed_01_01#You're destined to be a sports legend#$r 52 0 summer_Wed_01_02#Maybe, if you practice a lot#$r 53 -50 summer_Wed_01_03#No, you'll most likely fail and become a sales{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}an
Entries.fall_Wed: Hey, can I ask you something?^Hey, I want to ask you something.#$e#$q 54/55 fall_Wed_01_old#What do you think about my haircut?^Do you think the boys like my haircut?#$r 54 30 fall_Wed_01_01#It looks very fashionable.#$r 55 -30 fall_Wed_01_02#It looks like some kind of fungal growth.

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}.#$e#I'll see you around.

Entries.Rainy_Day_4: I think I might start reading books. I don't want to become stagnant now that I'm a married g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}!
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: Oh... the smell? I've been eating garlic all day. I'm trying to stay {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Masculine:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}... Sorry.$l
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to my new life as a stay-at-home {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}.$h
Entries.OneKid_1: Little %kid1 is going to grow up strong, just like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Daddy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}.
Entries.fall_26: I hope my grandparents are doing okay. Grand{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Grandpa:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}a's too cheap to turn on the furnace until the last minute.

Entries.OneKid_3: It was painfull when i was pregnant.^I wonder what it's like to be pregnant...?$h

Entries.Sun.000: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}} is completely engrossed in the game. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}e doesn't notice your presence.

Entries.Introduction: Hello! You must be @, the new farmer. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/CarolineName}}.#$e#My husband runs the general store here. And have you met my daughter, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}}? She's the pale one with the purple hair.
Entries.Thu: #$1 Caroline1#Hmmm... I wonder if I can get {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} to cook dinner tonight.#$e#Hmmm... what am I going to make for dinner tonight?#$e#Maybe I'll just get take-out from the Saloon.
Entries.Fri: It's a fine-looking day.#$e#On days like this I like to help {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EvelynName}} with the public gardens.#$e#She's strong for her age, but I think she appreciates all the help she can get.
Entries.Sat: Is it just me, or does {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} have an unhealthy interest in doom and gloom?#$e#Maybe I'm just too old to understand.
Entries.Sat_inlaw_Abigail: Dinner's been a lot quieter since {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} moved out...#$e#No, not because she used to chew with her mouth open!$h
Entries.Sat2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}}'s always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}}'s always had a strange interest in the occult. I'm not sure where she gets it from...
Entries.Sat6: #$1 Caroline12#When we first moved here, I took a while to settle down... I wasn't ready for the domestic life.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s a bit traditional... but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}e's a good {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}an. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}e's ambitious, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}e always puts h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} family first.
Entries.summer_Sat: Is it just me, or does {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} look a little pale?#$e#Maybe I'm just worrying about her too much.
Entries.summer_Sat_inlaw_Abigail: How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}}'s health? She's always been such a pale girl. Hopefully the farm lifestyle puts a little color in her cheeks.
Entries.fall_Mon: Fall is {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}}'s favorite season, so I'm hoping she'll come out of her room more often.
Entries.fall_Mon_inlaw_Abigail: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}} was taking online classes here, but I don't think her heart was really in it...#$e#She's a free spirit, like I was before I met {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}. She's probably having the time of her life on your farm.
Entries.winter_Sat: Don't you think {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}} would look better with her natural hair color?#$e#She used to have light chestnut-colored hair.

Entries.fall_25.002: Excuse me, I have to say some things to Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} in private...$u
Entries.Tue.001: You're looking really fit, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JodiName}}! Those dumbells do wonders, don't they?
Entries.winter_16.000: I'm getting all my holiday shopping done tonight! Let me know if you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} coming...

Entries.Introduction: Er... hi. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}.#$e#I'm the town blacksmith. If you ever need to upgrade your tools, I'm your g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}.
Entries.Mon: Yep. I'm a blacksmith.#$e#My {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther was also a blacksmith.#$e#My grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther was a blacksmith as well.$u#$q 9/9 Mon_old#I bet you can't guess what my great-grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther was...#$r 9 30 Mon_9#A blacksmith.#$r 9 50 Mon_clown#A silly clown.#$r 9 -50 Mon_rude#A sarcastic jerk.
Entries.Mon_old: And yes, my great-grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther was also a blacksmith.
Entries.Mon4: Be glad you're a farmer, @. It's nicer to work outdoors than by a hot furnace all day.#$e#I'm only a blacksmith because my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther pushed me into it.
Entries.summer_Mon4: Be glad you're a farmer, @. It's nicer to work outdoors than by a hot furnace all day.#$e#I'm only a blacksmith because my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}ther pushed me into it.

Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} won't even tell *me* who paid for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}}'s new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h
Entries.Mon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} helps me out in the lab sometimes... She's a good kid.
Entries.Mon_inlaw_Maru: It's hard to do good science without {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s help...#$b#But her happiness is much more important than my experiment!
Entries.Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#Don't tell her I said that.$h
Entries.Fri4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side.#$e#...now if I could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps I could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u
Entries.summer_Mon: #$e#%{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} is deep in thought.#$e#Sorry, I'm really busy.#$e#There's so many plants to study right now.
Entries.summer_Fri: $p 40#So I heard {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} had you look through that telescope out back.|If you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} become friends, I'm sure she'll show you how to use that telescope out back.#$e#Pretty exciting, huh?
Entries.fall_Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} sure spends a lot of time working on those gadgets of hers.#$e#I'm glad she's so dedicated.
Entries.fall_Fri_inlaw_Maru: I'm still flabbergasted about {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s secret robot... was it all a dream?
Entries.summer_25.001: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.

Entries.Introduction: Greetings! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}}, local scientist and {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}ther. Thanks for introducing yourself!#$e#I'm studying the local plants and animals from my home laboratory.#$b#Have you met my daughter {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}? She's interested to meet you.

Entries.summer_25.001: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}, have you read the latest 'Biology and Medicine'? There's an article I think you'd be interested in.

Entries.Introduction: Ah, the new farmer we've all been expecting... and whose arrival has sparked many a conversation!#$b#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ElliottName}}... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Entries.event_boat1: ... I was worried you might not feel this way about another {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }} }}an.$l^So am I.$l

Entries.OneKid_3: Caring for babies isn't exactly my strong suit... but I'll do my best to be a good {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }}.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I was carrying %kid1 earlier, and I could've sworn I heard a "{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dada:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }}...{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dada:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }} }}".$h
Entries.fall_26: Would you still love me if I guzzled two gallons of pumpkin ale at the Spirit's Eve festival? Sometimes a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }} }}an has primitive urges...

Entries.Mon: Have I told you {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} and I are sisters? Strange, isn't it?
Entries.Mon6: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} would get a job or at least contribute to cooking and cleaning.$s#$e#I think she's hoping to marry someone rich.$u
Entries.Mon6_inlaw_Haley: I have to say, now that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}'s gone I've had a much easier time keeping things in order.
Entries.Tue: I work part-time at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}' saloon. It pays the bills.
Entries.Tue4: I'm just working at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}' to make ends meet... but my real passion is tailoring.$u#$e#I made these clothes from scratch, see?
Entries.summer_Mon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} is a picky eater. It's so hard to cook for her.
Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Haley: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} and I get along much better now that she's moved out. I look forward to her visits!
Entries.summer_Tue6: I feel bad for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LinusName}}. People judge h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }}, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }} }}e's just living a different lifestyle.$u#$e#I wish everyone could learn to be accepting of others.
Entries.summer_Fri: If I wasn't so busy I'd come help you on the farm!#$e#But {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} would be upset if I had another job...$s
Entries.summer_Fri6: You know, I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} would understand if I wanted to leave the Saloon someday.#$b#There's so much out there, I can't stay a barmaid forever.$u
Entries.summer_Sat: Don't overwork yourself or you might end up in {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}'s clinic!
Entries.fall_Thu: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}e's a nice guy, if you get to know h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}e gets lonely working in h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} shop all day. But {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}e's so shy {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}e has trouble making new friends.
Entries.fall_Thu8: I think {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s mad at me. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}e never looks at me anymore...$u#$e#I always thought we were friends.$u
Entries.winter_Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}} and I aren't made for such a big house. It's a hassle to keep it clean.#$e#Ah well. I really shouldn't be complaining.#$e#Your farmhouse seems nice and cozy.$h
Entries.winter_Thu: It must be so cold for the poor fish.$s#$e#I wonder if any fish hibernate? Maybe I should ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}}.

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} seems to have problems organizing everything without me around.

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Oh, sweetie... that was so nice of you to put {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} up in a beautiful new house!$h#$e#It warms my heart when people take care of each other like that...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Call me a silly old fool... but I think I have an idea who paid for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}}'s new house... *wink*
Entries.Tue: Don't mind my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}e isn't very friendly to strangers.#$e#If you get to know h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} better {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}e'll warm up to you.#$e#I'm sure you two could become good friends one day!$h#$e#Since you're so interested in my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }} I'll let you in on a little secret: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}e really likes leeks! You can find them in the mountains this time of year.
Entries.Tue6: It's nice of you to take the time to visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} and I.#$e#Without young people around, we'd age much faster.$h
Entries.Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} spends the whole day in front of that darned television set.#$e#I wish {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}e'd go outside more. Some fresh air would do h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} good.
Entries.summer_Tue: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} is always a little less grumpy in the summer. The warm weather softens h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} bones.#$e#You might not be able to tell, but I can. I've known h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} for sixty years!
Entries.fall_Tue: I've been putting raisins in {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}'s oatmeal... but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}e hasn't said a word. I wonder if {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}e even notices these things?
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}?#$e#Sometime {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}e worries me sick.
Entries.winter_Sat8: @, have I told you that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} and I have lived in our house for 30 years?#$e#I hope you stay here for a while.$h

Entries.summer_Mon_inlaw_Alex: How's my grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Son:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }} doing? I imagine {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}e's quite happy living on the farm.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}e deserves to be happy... {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}e's a good {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Boy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}.

Entries.winter_17.000: This is one of the newer traditions in Pelican Town... but we've taken to it rather quickly. Haven't we, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}?
Entries.23.000: Now now, dear... It's important that Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} takes a good look at you. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }}e's a nice young {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} }}an! Behave yourself, for your dear old wife's sake.
Entries.23.001: Could you check h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} lungs? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}e's been wheezing lately.

Entries.Introduction: Hmmph... It's irritating to have to meet all these new people, huh?#$b#Name's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}, by the way. Now buzz off... Hmmph.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Welp... that new house blocks my view of the river a little... but it sure looks nicer than that old tin can {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} was livin' in.
Entries.Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}} is my grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Son:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s
Entries.Fri10: You know, I really have been a grumpy old {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }}an to everyone. But now I feel like I'm softening up like an old ripe fruit. Hehe!$h#$e#Take care, son.^Take care, hun.

Entries.Wed_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now. I'm glad that my grand{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Son:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }} found such a nice husband.^How can two {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}en get married? It's unnatural... Hmmph. I guess I'm just "old fashioned"...
Entries.Wed10_inlaw_Alex: You're part of the family, now... and I couldn't be more proud.^I'll admit, I thought it was... strange... for two {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}en to be together. But you're such a nice young man, and I know you two are in love... I've changed my mind.

Entries.Introduction: Well hello there! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}, chef and owner of the Stardrop Saloon.#$e#Stop in if you need any refreshments. I've always got hot coffee and cold beer at the ready.$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Hey. I heard what you did for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}}. That was really really nice of you!$h#$e#Sadly, I don't think it will get her to cut back on the 'beverages'...
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I saw {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} earlier today... she was grinning from ear to ear! She said someone bought her a new house!#$e#Whoever it was, they truly deserve the best!$h
Entries.SeedShop_Entry: Hi, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}!/Now, what do I need.../Ah, that looks good!/Makin' my special sauce tonight!/{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}! What's fresh?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}! Waddya got for me?
Entries.Wed: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}'s been working here for a while now. I don't know what I'd do without her!#$e#I would hate to have to clean all those pots by myself.$s
Entries.Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}} come into the saloon almost every night.#$e#I'd probably go out of business if they stopped coming.$h#$e#So make sure you don't drive them away!
Entries.Thu6: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}} comes into the saloon almost every night and sits at the same table by h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}self.#$e#Sometimes {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}e glances over at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} with a nervous look. Hmmm.#$e#Maybe that's why {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}e comes in so often. Oh well, that means more business for me.
Entries.Thu8: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} comes into the saloon almost every night and drinks way too much beer.#$e#Ah well, I shouldn't pass judgement on my customers.

Entries.Mon.000: I'm getting some supplies for the saloon. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s got the good stuff.$h

Entries.Introduction: Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Haleyname}}.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, nevermind.$h
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}} is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.summer_Sun: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} usually cooks dinner... But she makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my sister for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}'s not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell her I said so.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}} for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}} could you tell h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.Event_room1: H{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}. But not anymore! {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}e's immature.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} isn't too lonely all by herself. I should visit her again soon.$7

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey! I'm mostly just here to visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}.

Entries.Introduction: It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}, the local doctor.#$e#I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.#$e#I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.$h
Entries.event_george1: Thanks, @.$h#$b#You see, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}, I'm just trying to help you.
Entries.event_george2: *Sigh*$s#$b#Look, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}}. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.

Entries.Outdoor_2: I may not be the most exciting g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }}, but I'll stay loyal to you for the rest of my life.$l
Entries.OneKid_3: So far, I really like being a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} }}ther!$h
Entries.TwoKids_3: My life is devoted to you and the children now, and I'm very happy about it. I always dreamed of having a wonderful family.$l#$e#I had nightmares of being a bachelor{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Bachelor:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} forever.... I love you so much.$l
Entries.summer_1: Make sure you don't get sunburnt, dear! It's very dangerous for your skin.$8#$e#As your {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} }} and doctor, I consider your health and safety my top priority!

Entries.Wed4: Aunt {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} won't let me go out after 6 o'clock. It's not fair!$s#$e#I'm not afraid of the dark anymore!
Entries.Thu2: Miss {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} is teaching me how to write in cursive.$h#$e#She has such pretty handwriting.
Entries.Sat2: Sometimes I look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it.
Entries.Sun2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}}'s gone a lot, and Aunt {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} is busy all the time... so I have to invent my own games.#$e#I'm thankful for all my toys.$h

Entries.Sun10: Did you know {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}}'s my god{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}ther? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}e was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...they died.*sniff*$s

Entries.winter_18.001: Can you show me how this tool works, Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}?

Entries.Introduction: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JodiName}}.#$e#It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a farmer around could really change things.
Entries.2_1: My {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }} {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KentName}} is a soldier, working overseas. That's why {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's not here right now.#$b#I know {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e'll come back safe once h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} tour is over!!#$e#Need something?
Entries.Fri: $d Joja#The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!|The food at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Entries.Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}'s safe return.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}'s safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Entries.summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam: How's my little {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamNickname}} doing on the old farm?$h
Entries.fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam: Is {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} just bumming around the farm, or is {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}e contributing?
Entries.fall_Sun: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/CarolineName}} and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
Entries.winter_Wed4_2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KentName}} has been home for a while now, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e still seems uneasy.$s
Entries.winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}e moved out...
Entries.winter_Thu8: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KentName}} being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.$s#$e#I can't believe I'm saying this to you.$4

Entries.Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} was a little baby wearing diapers. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}e was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Entries.fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the kids a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s basically a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}an now, though.#$b#I hope {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}e hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
Entries.winter_Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} makes a lot of noise with that music of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.

Entries.spring_11.003: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} was very brave at the doctor's today. I'm proud of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }}.
Entries.spring_11.002: Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}? I'm worried about {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}'s height. Isn't {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e a little short for h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} age?
Entries.spring_11.000: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} hates going to the doctor more than anything, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e'll just have to deal with it.

Entries.Thu6: #$1 Kent1#I've been up since 4 o'clock... sometimes I wonder if I'll ever get back into a normal routine.$k#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} has really grown up since I left. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}e's a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}an now.#$e#I wish I could've been there for h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}.$s
Entries.Sat: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JodiName}} tells me you've really become a part of this community. I'm glad to hear it.

Entries.Thu: Are you friends with my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Son:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}?#$e#You probably know h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} better than I do...$s

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I wonder if the {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }} }} knows about... this? I hope {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }} }}e can keep a secret.$s

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: @, I heard what you did for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}... now *that's* the kind of community support I love to see in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} to build {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} a house! {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h
Entries.summer_Town_57_40: #$c .3#Ah, my flowers are growing wonderfully!$h#$c .3#Good morning! Can you smell the sweet scent of these dew-lilies?#$e#It's early but the air is already quite warm. Summer is nice for an old {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gentleman:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }} like me hehe.
Entries.summer_Thu: The saloon gets pretty lively at night.#$e#I like to visit once a week or so to catch up on things. And to get a taste of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}' authentic spaghetti.
Entries.summer_Fri: Hmm... I wonder if it's anyone's birthday today? I'd better check the calendar by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s shop.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Have you tried {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}' 'secret' spaghetti sauce?$s#$b#...The ingredients may be secret, but the smell isn't.#$b#I'll see you later.
Entries.winter_Sun: Hi there, @! How're you doing today?$h#$e#If you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}, tell her I say 'hi'.

Entries.fall_9.000: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}? This is completely confidential, right?
Entries.6.000: I'm here to collect {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s business tax.
Entries.3.000: I'm just here to make sure all of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}'s business needs are met.

Entries.Wed2: I have to be wary of strangers. Most people don't like a 'wild {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }} }}an'.

Entries.Introduction: Ah, Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} told me you just arrived. I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}!#$e#I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. You should swing by some time.$h
Entries.Saloon_Fri: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} doesn't seem to notice that you're there...
Entries.Saloon_Sat: I always see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}} here but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} }}e won't talk to anyone. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }}e just glances over h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} shoulder now and then.$s
Entries.Fri4: #$1 marnieLike#I think someone in town has taken a liking to me. *teehee*$k$h#$e#I would be so lonely if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}} ever moved out.

Entries.Fri6: I wonder if M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} gets lonely in that big house of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }}... $s#$e#It seems so empty in there, doesn't it?

Entries.Tue: My n{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Nephew:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }} {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}} has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}e helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.

Entries.fall_18.000: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}? This is completely confidential, right?
Entries.winter_18.002: Erm... Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}? When you give her the shots, can we have two lollipops?

Entries.Rainy_Night_Maru: Where you able to accomplish much today, hun?#$e#I tried to fix up some things around the house... you know, just little stuff.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Sam: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} called. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }}e said {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e misses me and also to tell you hi.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_Shane: I just got off the phone with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}. They seem to be having a pretty good time without me.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Sebastian: #$c .5#I may be a reclusive g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}, but I'm always happy when you're around.$h#$e#Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.$h
Entries.jobReturn_Penny: #$c .5#Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours?$h#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...
Entries.winter_Sebastian: I wonder what {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s up to? We used to be really good friends.
Entries.winter_Sam: I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}an now!

Entries.Introduction: Oh! Aren't you the one who just moved in?#$b#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}. I've been looking forward to meeting you!$h#$e#You know, with a small town like this, a new face can really alter the community dynamic. It's exciting!
Entries.Wed: On Tuesdays and Thursdays I work at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}'s clinic.#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }}e says {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} }}e likes having me around in case h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} medical equipment goes haywire!$h#$e#Being a farmer must be pretty easy, huh?
Entries.Wed8: I work at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}'s clinic on Tuesdays and Thursdays.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }}e's nice, but not really my type...
Entries.Event_Hospital_1: Of course {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} }}e'll know the difference! This sample is completely ruined!%fork$s
Entries.Event_Hospital_3: You're right. I should just tell h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} the truth.%fork$u

Entries.Sat: Do you know my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}e's a scientist. I have a lot of fun helping h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} out in the laboratory.
Entries.Fri4: My mother is a carpenter and my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }} is a scientist. I guess it makes sense that I'm into building gadgets.
Entries.summer_Sun: I bet you're growing some interesting crops right now.#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} says a lot of exotic plants grow in the valley this time of year.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#I would go but my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }} would flip.

Entries.event_robot3: Heh...$8#$b#Yeah I guess {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}e did kinda say that, didn't {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}e?$l#$b#...Um...$l
Entries.summer_Tue: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} is my half-{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}, if you didn't know already.#$e#We look totally different.
Entries.summer_Tue4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} hardly ever talks to me. I wonder if {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e even likes me at all?#$e#It's sad, I want to have a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }} but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e doesn't act like one.

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I wonder how {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} is doing? Maybe I'll give her a call later today.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}'s been tracking the weather patterns for the last twenty years.#$e#It's a little too early to tell, but the results have revealed some abnormal trends.
Entries.funReturn_Maru: {{DemetriusRobinParents}} are doing just fine. Their routine is still the same, even with me gone. How was your day?
Entries.spring_22: If my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }} wasn't such a hermit I'd invite h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} over for dinner sometime.
Entries.summer_20: I wonder if my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }} will ever have the courage to ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} out?
Entries.winter_5: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}'s doing okay... {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}e can get depressed in winter, when there's less opportunity for field research.

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} decides to get married some day.

Entries.Thu: Hey. Don't tell anyone about this place, okay? I want to keep it... exclusive.#$e#You'd keep a secret for your friend M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Qi}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/QiName}}, wouldn't you?

Entries.Introduction: Hey, kid. The name's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}}.#$e#Don't be a jerk and we'll get along fine.
Entries.Saloon_Entry: Ah... Finally./I need a drink./{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}! Gimme the usual./Hey, I'm back!/Ooh boy, am I thirsty!/I'm parched!
Entries.Trailer_Entry: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}! Did you make dinner?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}! You done your chores?/{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Saloon_Fri: Oi, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}! Gimme another pint of your strongest!
Entries.Saloon_Sun: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} seems out of it. Better leave her alone right now.
Entries.Thu: #$1 PamDrunk#Blahh... I had one too many caramel porters at the saloon last night... Go away.$k#$e#My house ain't pretty but at least it's by the river.#$e#Hey. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}'s my baby girl. Be nice to her or leave her alone, got it?
Entries.Thu4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} says I spend too much time at the saloon...$s
Entries.Sun: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }}e's a pretty good g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }}.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }}e even gives me free beer on my birthday.
Entries.fall_Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}'s the only one I've got, so you best treat her kindly.
Entries.winter_Tue4: I just hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} has a good life ahead of her. If you ever have kids you'll know how I feel.#$e#...It's so dry in winter. My skin feels like old parchment.
Entries.winter_Tue4_inlaw_Penny: Hey. You better be treatin' {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} right on that old farm of yours. She's the only one I got!
Entries.winter_Fri: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} sure does like old books. I think she's a heck of a lot smarter than I ever was.#$e#I'm glad.

Entries.Tue: I'm tutoring {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} today... They're a handful, but it's nice to make a difference in someone's life.
Entries.Wed: We don't have a school here but I'm doing my best to give {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} a proper education.#$e#Every child deserves a chance to be successful.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} is very good at math and reading. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} is good at... well, {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e has an active imagination!
Entries.Sat2: $d Joja#Things changed a lot after the JojaMart went up. It's been really bad for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s shop. Mom loves JojaMart, though. The prices are cheap, so she can afford a lot more there than she ever could at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s.|Mom's been complaining ever since JojaMart closed down. I think it's good for her, though. Maybe she'll drink less Joja Cola now.
Entries.event_mail1: Thank you...$l#$b#I just wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} wasn't so upset... I was only trying to help.$s
Entries.winter_Thu: Oh... hi. You want to talk?$u#$e#If you find any interesting artifacts or minerals, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GuntherName}} will gladly display them in the museum.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gunther}} }}e told me {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gunther}} }} }}e has special gifts for people who donate.

Entries.winter_Fri2: Are you friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LinusName}}? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }}e lives in a tent up in the mountains.#$e#Everyone ignores h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }}, the poor g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Linus}} }}e's actually really nice... Just a little odd.#$e#It must be so cold to live in a tent this time of year.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} and Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} will ever get together? I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} likes her...#$e#I think {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} will have to make the first move, though.$h

Entries.marriage_Mon.002: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} will get married some day?

Entries.Introduction: Hey, it's Mr. @, the new farmer! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}, owner of the local general store.^Hey, it's Ms. @, the new farmer! I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}, owner of the local general store.#$b#If you're looking for seeds, my shop is the place to go. I'll also buy produce from you for a good price!#$e#A little agriculture could really inject new life into the local economy!
Entries.Mon4_inlaw_Abigail: Hi, @. How's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} doing? The shop hasn't been the same without her...
Entries.Thu8: #$1 pierre2#Does {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} look anything like me? Don't tell my wife, but sometimes I wonder if I'm really the {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}ther.$k$s#$e#Don't tell my wife, but I hate to cook dinner.
Entries.winter_Wed: #$1 pierreDin#I'm going to surprise {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/CarolineName}} tonight with dinner and a bottle of Stardew Red. Don't tell anyone!$k#$e#Finally, a day of relaxation.

Entries.Evelyn: When I woke up I heard dripping from somewhere... I think the roof might be leaking.$s#$e#In the old days, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} would've scampered right up and fixed it... *sigh*$s
Entries.Emily: It never rains in Calico Desert... That's where my friend {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}} lives.#$e#I wish I could've visited her today.$s

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} seem really happy.
Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} showed you around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!
Entries.Fri: You've met my son {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}, right? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}e lives downstairs.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}e's a little shy, but I'm sure {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e'll warm up to you if you're nice to h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianNickname}}... {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}'s room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}... {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} future very much...#$e#I would talk to h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} about it but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} told me {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}e's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}.
Entries.Sun: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} doesn't blow the house up with those science experiments of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}.#$e#I'm not even sure what {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}e's working on. I think it has something to do with plants.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#My {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }} almost set the house on fire last night with h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} science experiment. One of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters! Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. It's my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}'s bizarre science project...
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} likes gems. She uses them in her inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} getting along?
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianNickname}}.

Entries.Introduction: Hey, I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}. Good to meet you.$h
Entries.Mon8: I'll tell you a secret... my name '{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}' is short for '{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamLongname}}'.$10#$e#Most people don't know that so keep it on mute.
Entries.winter_7: One time, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} fell in the river during the Ice Festival. We had to build a huge fire in the saloon to dry h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} out.#$e#We were all worried we'd never taste h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} famous spaghetti ever again.

Entries.Wed6: I've been friends with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} for a while. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}e's a pretty cool g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }}.#$e#If you two weren't around I wouldn't really have any friends in town.
Entries.Thu6_1: I think my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} might be coming back in a year or so.#$e#I guess you might be able to meet h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}, then. If you're still living here.#$e#You wouldn't abandon the farm after putting so much effort into it!
Entries.Thu6_2: ...I have mixed feelings about my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}ther being back. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}e seems strange.$s#$b#But I guess I haven't seen h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} in 3 years... so that could explain it.
Entries.Thu2: My {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} is a soldier, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's not here...#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}e'll come back someday.#$e#...I've heard some terrible things about the Gotoro Empire...$s
Entries.Thu_2: Well, my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} is back. Have you met h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}#$b#I'm just glad {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's okay.
Entries.Thu2_2: Well, my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} is back. Have you met h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}#$b#I'm just glad {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's okay.
Entries.Fri4: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} used to work as a garbage {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}an in the city.#$e#You don't even want to know some of the things {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e found in people's trash.
Entries.spring_12: My little {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }} gets so excited for festivals. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }}e's been talking about tomorrow's egg hunt all day.
Entries.summer_Mon6: Have you been to the desert yet?#$e#You can find some interesting things there. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} took me a couple times when I was younger.
Entries.summer_Thu: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} was telling me about our national enemy, the Gotoro Empire... They sound like a ruthless bunch.
Entries.summer_Thu6_1: Sometimes I can hear my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} pacing down the hallway at night.$s#$b#...But {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e won't tell us what's troubling h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}.
Entries.fall_Thu6_1: I think my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} might be coming back next year.#$e#I guess that's kind of soon. Weird.
Entries.winter_Thu6_1: I think my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} is coming back this spring.#$e#Tt's been 3 years since I've seen h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}. This is going to be strange.
Entries.winter_Thu6: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}'s been back for a while now. I guess I'm finally getting used to it.
Entries.winter_Thu: My {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} is in the military, fighting against the Gotoro Empire. That's why {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's not here.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}e's coming back soon, though.

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Do you think {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}} will ever hook up?#$e#Heh... now that I'm married I'm trying to get everyone else married too.
Entries.Outdoor_3: Something in the air makes me feel positive... maybe it's the faint whiff of pizza from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}' ovens.
Entries.TwoKids_3: I never thought I'd become such a family {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}an, but I'm really satisfied with what we've built here. Life is going great.$h
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be cool to see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} again.
Entries.fall_26: I wonder if Mom will let {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} enter the haunted maze this year. Probably not...$h#$e#Poor kid. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }}e's gonna have to grow up some day...

Entries.OneKid_1: It's weird, but I really like being a {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}ther!$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}'s not too lonely now that I'm gone... I kinda felt responsible for the little {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Boy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}.$s#$e#But, life's all about change... right? Kids need to learn that, eventually... Or else adulthood will destroy them.$7

Entries.marriage_Mon.001: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} seems a little lonely without me around. I used to play with h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} a lot.
Entries.fall_11.000: I gotta go visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Uncle:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Harvey}} }} Doctor today... Great.$7
Entries.fall_11.001: I'm a healthy {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Boy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}, doc. Can I go now? This is boring.

Entries.Wed: Why hello there! If you see my friend {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} in town, could you tell her I said 'Hi'?#$e#Thanks!$h
Entries.Sat: Hi! Welcome to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}}'s Oasis, the number one destination in Calico Desert!#$e#*whisper* Did I sound professional?$h#$e#Make sure to check out our seasonal seed selection.#$e#You look really thirsty. Here, have a taste of this ice cold milk. [184]#$e#Tasty, huh?$h
Entries.Fri4: My name's not really {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}}, you know. It's just good for business.#$e#But everyone calls me {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}} anyway, so I've just gotten used to it.

Entries.Wed2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} is probably my only friend in this town.#$e#Well, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}} is nice too, but...$h#$e#Umm.. nevermind.
Entries.Wed2_inlaw_Abigail: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} is probably my only friend in this town, anymore...
Entries.Wed6: You and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} are probably my only friends in this town.$s
Entries.Thu4: Why does everyone like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} so much? Sure, she's smart and friendly, but don't they realize it's all just an attention-grabbing scam?#$e#Sorry...$s
Entries.Fri8: What's new?$h#$e#I'll be at the saloon tonight destroying {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} at pool again.$h
Entries.winter_Sun: I built a snowgoon but {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} made me get rid of it.#$e#What's h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} problem?$u
Entries.winter_Sun6: I built a snowgoon but {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} made me get rid of it... yet {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s cute little snowman goes unharmed!$a#$e#Ridiculous.

Entries.fall_Tue6: Who does {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} think {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}e is, telling me what to do? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }}e's not even my real {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Father:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Demetrius}} }} }}ther.$a

Entries.Rainy_Night_4: Maybe a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }} will visit us tonight? Hah.. if only life was that interesting...
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: It's really cool to have our own place. I can do whatever I feel like and not have people nagging at me all the time.#$e#I'm sure {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s happy that I'm gone.
Entries.TwoKids_1: I hope %kid1 and %kid2 are nice to each other. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} and I always fought as kids.#$e#If I think back on it, it was mostly my fault...
Entries.Good_3: I don't often show it, but I'm really happy that I'm your {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}. Marrying you was the best decision I ever made.$l
Entries.spring_12: Are you excited for tomorrow's festival? It'll be good to see {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} again.
Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is a little crowded for my tastes... but I'll just hang out with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}. It'll be good to catch up with h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}.#$e#You should play some carnival games, though! Don't worry about me.$7

Entries.Outdoor_3: I don't want to get soft now that I'm a married girl. Maybe I should start eating more hot pepper and working out?#$e#Just an idea...$h
Entries.OneKid_0: I'm still getting used to being a mother. Don't worry, I'll take good care of %kid1! It's just... something new.
Entries.spring_23: Oh... tomorrow's the flower dance, isn't it? Do we have to go?#$e#I hate wearing that ridiculous tight {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Jumpsuit:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sebastian}} }} }}. Why does {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} make us do this?$s

Entries.summer_4.000: Dammit... I almost forgot. I have to go see Doctor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} today.
Entries.Fri.000: Should I let {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} win for once? ...nah.$h
Entries.marriage_Fri.001: My skills haven't declined... {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s still just as easy to beat.$h

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: I heard you built {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} a house... That's really generous...#$b#You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...#$e#*ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: I heard someone bought {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} a house... *sigh*... What did {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} ever do to earn that kind of generosity??
Entries.dumped_Guys: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}} has a glazed look in h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }} eye. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}e won't speak to you.
Entries.event_room1: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ElliottName}} for advice next time I see h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }} at the saloon.$s
Entries.Wed8: I guess I've grown attached to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}}. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.#$e#I never really had much of a family as a kid.$s
Entries.JojaMart: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}}'s hard at work. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}e doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.Fri4: $d Joja#What's the point of life if all you do is work?|I haven't been able to pay my rent, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}'s letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky.
Entries.Sat4: $d Joja#I'm renting my room from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.|If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.
Entries.Sat8: I've really grown attached to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}'s chickens.$h

Entries.Rainy_Day_0: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} are doing alright without me.#$e#I'm not too worried... {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} is old enough now to take care of the animals on her own.
Entries.Good_2: The name '{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}}' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.
Entries.Bad_6: What do you want? You sound like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} on one of her bad days. Go away.$a
Entries.fall_15: I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.$6

Entries.Indoor_Day_4: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}.$6
Entries.OneKid_3: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Papa:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Papa:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }} }} {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}} reporting for duty...$6#$e#Buh... I've become corny in my old age.
Entries.Good_6: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a g{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Guy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }} could need.$h

Entries.marriage_Fri.002: If I don't order a cold one now and then, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} will go out of business. I'm just doing my civic duty. I'll head home around 10.
Entries.winter_15.000: I'm taking a night off from the saloon for {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}}' sake...

Entries.Introduction: Oh, a stranger! My name's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}.#$b#Momma says not to talk to strangers... But you seem okay.
Entries.Mon4: $d kent#I'm glad {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}'s back... but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e's different than I remember...$s|{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}'s not around much... I miss playing with h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}.$s
Entries.Tue6: Can you keep a secret, mister?^Can you keep a secret, miss?$u#$b#I wanna marry Miss {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} when I grow up.#$e#Just don't tell her, okay?$u
Entries.Sat: Miss {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} makes me read a new book every week.$s#$b#At least she lets me pick them, sometimes!
Entries.Sat_1: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}'s coming back soon!#$b#I hope {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e brings me some toys.$u
Entries.Sat8: $d kent#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} seems weird since {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} }}e came back. I wonder what happened to h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}$s#$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }}e doesn't play with me anymore.$s|I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Kent}} }} will ever come home...$s

Entries.Mon: I wanna be just like my big {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Brother:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }} when I grow up!$h#$e#Okay! Bye!

Entries.Tue6: The ol' {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Willy}} }}an was a fisher{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Willy}} }} }}an, you know. I grew up sailing between the fern islands, living from catch to catch.#$e#The fishing life is tough, but there's something about it that keeps you goin'.

Entries.Fri6: I was married, long ago. After my {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }} and I split, {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }}e began flying around the countryside, cursing everything {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }}e saw.#$e#It's not a very mature way to express one's anger.

Entries.Thu10: You musn't tell anyone... but I have reason to believe that one of the locals is actually my daughter...#$e#I gave her up for adoption... Maybe someone have adopted her in this town.

Entries.Sam0: I'm going to be really happy as your {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} }}, @.$l#$e#I'm excited.

Entries.Morris_PlayerSignedUp: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.#$b#Now, let me call Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_MembershipAvailab: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} promised us that if anyone else joined up, {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }} }}e'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_MembershipAvailable: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} promised us that if anyone else joined up, {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }} }}e'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#I'm glad {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s stock is starting to expand again.#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityLow: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} found that thing.$s#$e# Anyways...
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} was selling that {5} for so cheap...
Entries.PurchasedItem_4: So I was at the store the other day and {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I bought it.$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s shop the other day. #$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}e said that {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}e grew the thing in h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} own backyard. I didn't know {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} was such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like you might have some competition, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Cooking: I bought the tastiest {2} from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s shop the other day. #$b#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}e said {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}e cooked the thing h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}self using local ingredients. I didn't know {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} was such {3} {4} chef!
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s shop the other day. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}e said {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} }}e found it h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}self while exploring the mountains. I didn't know {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} was such a talented forager!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Pierre_QualityHigh: Hey, remember that {2} you sold me the other day? I ended up serving it to the family for a special dinner.#$b#My wife loved it! ...And {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}} even started going to town on it after I smothered the thing in hoisin sauce. $h#$b#... well,... back to business, huh?
Entries.PurchasedItem_Haley: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} tried to serve me {1} {2} for dinner last night... I threw it away when she wasn't looking.#$e#I don't like health food...$s
Entries.PurchasedItem_Elliott: I saw that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} had fresh {2} in the shop the other day! Marvelous. It smelled just perfect... and firm, too!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s. It was perfect on a bed of greens and a dash of my 'special' vinaigrette.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh_Willy: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}}'s the other day and bought {1} {2}. I've never seen one so fresh! #$b#So I cooked it up for dinner last night, and it filled the house with a {3} smell..
