The one whose arrival I have long foreseen."/pause 1500/speak Wizard "Here, I'd like to show you something."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/playMusic none/pause 800/speak Wizard "Behold!"/playMusic clubloop/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 19/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo 10 17/specificTemporarySprite junimoCage/pause 3000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/showFrame Wizard 4/pause 2000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You've seen one before, haven't you?"/move Wizard 0 -1 1/pause 1000/shake Junimo 800/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "They call themselves the 'Junimos'...#$b#Mysterious spirits, these ones... For some reason, they refuse to speak with me."/pause 1000/playSound dwop/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/screenFlash .8/warp Junimo -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite junimoCageGone/playMusic WizardSong/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "I'm not sure why they've moved into the community center, but you have no reason to fear them."/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -1 0/emote farmer 48/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Hmmm? You found a golden scroll written in an unknown language?#$b#Most interesting..."/move Wizard 0 1 2/speak Wizard "Stay here. I'm going to see for myself. I'll return shortly."/pause 1000/playSound shwip/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 50/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 500/playSound wand/warp Wizard -3000 -3000/specificTemporarySprite wizardWarp/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 2000/playSound dwop/faceDirection Wizard 0 true/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 50/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1500/playSound doorClose/warp Wizard 8 24/faceDirection farmer 2 true/showFrame farmer 94/startJittering/move Wizard 0 -1 0/stopJittering/showFrame farmer 0/move Wizard 0 -2 0/speak Wizard "I found the note..."/move Wizard -2 0 3/pause 800/speak Wizard "The language is obscure, but I was able to decipher it:"/pause 1000/message "We, the Junimo, are happy to aid you. In return, we ask for gifts of the valley. If you are one with the forest then you will see the true nature of this scroll."/pause 500/move Wizard 0 -2 3/faceDirection farmer 3 true/move Wizard -3 0 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 18/emote Wizard 40/speak Wizard "Hmm... 'One with the forest'... What do they mean?"/pause 1000/speak Wizard "...*sniff*...*sniff*..."/pause 1500/showFrame Wizard 0/jump Wizard/pause 800/speak Wizard "Ah-hah!$h"/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Come here!$h"/pause 500/move farmer -2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 3/move farmer -2 0 3/move Wizard -1 0 2/move farmer -1 0 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "My cauldron is bubbling with ingredients from the forest.$h#$b#Baby fern, moss grub, caramel-top toadstool... Can you smell it?$h"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/showFrame 96/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Here. Drink up. Let the essence of the forest permeate your body.$h"/pause 800/emote farmer 28/showFrame Wizard 19/pause 800/showFrame farmer 90/pause 1000/farmerEat 184/pause 4000/playSound gulp/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 4000/specificTemporarySprite farmerForestVision/pause 7000/pause 19500/globalFade .008/specificTemporarySprite junimoCageGone2/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic none/pause 2000/playSound reward/pause 300/message "You've gained the power of forest magic! Now you can decipher the true meaning of the junimo scrolls."/end warpOut
Entries.418172/n hasPickedUpMagicInk: WizardSong/2 14/farmer 3 14 3 Wizard 1 14 1/skippable/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You've found my ink! Excellent."/move Wizard 1 0 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Er..."/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/pause 500/speak Wizard "Did you... happen to see my ex-{{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Husband:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }}#$b#No? Well, what about h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} house...?#$b#Do you think {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }} }}e lives alone? Or...$h"/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 0/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/speak Wizard "...Actually, don't tell me... I don't want to know."/pause 500/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/speak Wizard "Anyway... you must be wondering about your reward. Here..."/move Wizard -1 0 1/pause 800/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/showFrame Wizard 16/pause 800/specificTemporarySprite arcaneBook/playSound fireball/shake Wizard 500/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 0/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection Wizard 0/pause 500/speak Wizard "It's a book of summoning.#$b#The arcane potential is immense... but I'll make it simple for you.#$b#By using this book, you can summon magic buildings directly to your farm.#$b#I think you'll find it useful."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Oh, I almost forgot to say... ahem... Thank you."/pause 1000/emote farmer 32/pause 800/end

Entries.Leah_spouse: I learned all of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}}'s techniques last year, but she's always one step ahead of me!
Entries.Sebastian_spouse: Hey, @. I'm just catching up with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}. Go ahead and have some fun.
Entries.Sam_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}'s the same as always. Are you having fun at the festival?
Entries.Demetrius: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}} really works hard on her carpentry stuff... she deserves a little recognition now and then.
Entries.Caroline: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} is very serious about h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} grange display. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}e's been setting aside the best-looking produce for weeks in preparation.#$e#Hey, best of luck to you if you enter!
Entries.Evelyn: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Pam: Better hurry up, kid... Before ol' {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} here fishes every last lunker out of the tent! Hehe.$h
Entries.Jodi: He doesn't look very happy... I guess Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} had to cut costs with a budget clown this year.
Entries.Leah: I really admire {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}}'s carpentry skills. I use a lot of the same techniques in my own line of work.
Entries.Marnie: I tried my best, but my display is pretty weak compared to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s.$s#$e#Well, maybe the judges will give me bonus points for the massive cheese wheel.
Entries.Elliott: I'm trying to get {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} to tell me h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} sauce recipe, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} }}e won't budge.
Entries.Gus: Eat as much as you like! It's all free today... compliments of Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}}.$h#$e#Oh! Make sure to dribble some of my secret sauce on there.
Entries.Harvey: And just a few steps over there, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.$s#$e#I've got some soul-searching to do...$11
Entries.Marlon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s blades get sharper every year.#$e#So do h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} prices...

Entries.Demetrius: I haven't seen {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} in hours... I hope she's alright.
Entries.Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky.#$e#That strange {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sex:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }} }}an who lives in the tower set it all up h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}self. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}e wouldn't let anyone near while {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }} }}e was working on it.
Entries.Evelyn: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchinni skewers, maybe?
Entries.Jodi: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}'s upset that I won't let h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} go into the haunted maze... but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e's just a little {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Boy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}!
Entries.Jas: But Aunt {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared!$s

Entries.AbbyWin: pause 100/jump Abigail/faceDirection Vincent 3/pause 800/move Abigail 0 -1 0/faceDirection Vincent 0/speak Lewis "Here's your prize, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}}. Enjoy!"/pause 500/move Abigail 0 -1 0/playSound coin/pause 400/move Abigail 0 2 0/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Egg Festival. Thanks for coming, everyone!"/pause 1000/viewport move 1 -1 5000/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Maru_spouse: I'm just catching up with {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}. Have you had your fill of eggs?
Entries.Penny_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s trying to convince me to eat a deviled egg. I'm just not sure I can stomach it...
Entries.Sebastian: We used to do a rotten egg toss...#$b#Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} put an end to that pretty quick.
Entries.Caroline: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailNickname}}'s always loved the egg hunt, ever since she was a tiny girl.
Entries.Jodi: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} loves this festival... it's a joy to see h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} so happy.
Entries.Jas: I hope I can find some eggs before {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}} takes them all...$s

Entries.Caroline: I wish {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}} would spend this time with the family...$s
Entries.Clint: I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} would dance with me?
Entries.Kent: This open field... it makes me nervous.#$e#*whisper* Happy thoughts, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KentName}}. Happy Thoughts.
Entries.Elliott: I wore my best {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shirt:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Elliott}} }} }} for the dance... This sort of thing doesn't happen very often!

Entries.Maru_spouse: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Entries.Maru: Whatever {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LinusName}} is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Entries.Sebastian: One year {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.#$e#Ever wondered why {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} leads the town in community service hours?$h
Entries.Penny: We do this festival every year to give the governor a taste of everything the valley has to offer.#$e#Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} hopes it will get the governor on our good side. That's why {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Lewis}} }} }}e's so neurotic about the way the soup tastes.
Entries.Harvey: Good thing I came with sunscreen.#$e#I wonder if {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}} could use some sunscreen on her shoulders?

Entries.Pam: Don't tell {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}, but I'm a little disappointed there's no buffet tonight.
Entries.Sam: I wonder if they're poisonous?#$e#Maybe I shouldn't push {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} in the water after all...$h

Entries.DickWin: pause 100/jump Willy/faceDirection Elliott 3/pause 800/move Willy 0 -1 0/faceDirection Elliott 0/speak Lewis "Here's your prize, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}}. Enjoy."/pause 500/move Willy 0 -2 0/move Lewis -1 0 2/move Lewis 0 1 2/playSound coin/pause 400/move Lewis 0 -1 0/pause 500/speak Lewis "Well, that's it for this year's Festival of Ice. Thanks for coming, everyone!#$b#Now let's release these poor fish...$s"/move Lewis -2 0 0/pause 600/viewport move 1 0 5000/pause 2000/playMusic none/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "I didn't win the competition, but it was still fun! Time to head home."/waitForOtherPlayers festivalEnd/end
Entries.Evelyn: Did I ever tell you how {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GeorgeName}} and I first met? {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}e actually pelted me with a snowball in this very festival.#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }}e was a {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gentleman:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/George}} }} }} back then, and came over to see if I was okay.$h
Entries.Clint: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}} started helping me without any provocation... does that mean something? *gulp*$4
Entries.Pam: I plan on winning the ice fishing competition!#$e#{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}} is gonna be pretty hard to beat, though... {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Willy}} }}e does this kinda stuff day and night.$s
Entries.Elliott: I'm entering the ice fishing competition today. Why not?#$e#It's rare that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}} ever loses, though.

Entries.Leah: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}} was just telling me about h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} artisan candy canes. *yawn*$u#$e#I think {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gus}} }} }}e had too much cinnamon nog.

Entries.haley_photo: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}'s too involved with her camera to notice you.
Entries.shane_work: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ShaneName}}'s hard at work. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Shane}} }}e doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.marnie_exercise: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}} smiles at you through a mist of sweat.
Entries.vincent_read_right: Ms. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}} says I have to read this book before I can go play.$s
Entries.sam_work: %{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s on the clock... better not get h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} in trouble.

Entries.AbigailInMine3: Hey! It's a relief to see you down here...$h#$e#Um... don't tell my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }} I'm here, okay?$9

Entries.Bus_NoDriver: You'll have to wait until {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}}'s on duty to ride the bus.
Entries.Desert_SandDragon_MrQiNote: 'You've proven yourself, kid. Check out the pile of lumber next to your house. -M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Qi}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/QiName}}'
Entries.Railroad_Box_MrQiNote: 'Well done. Your next task: Place 10 beets inside Mayor's fridge. -M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Qi}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/QiName}}'
Entries.ManorHouse_MayorFridge_MrQiNote: 'Good job, kid. Your final task: Give the sand dragon his last meal. -M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Qi}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/QiName}}'
Entries.Tunnel_TunnelSafe_MrQiNote: 'Your first task: Bring a rainbow shell to the train platform. Leave it in the box. -M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Qi}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/QiName}}'
Entries.SamHouse_Sam_Trash: Looks like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}} cleans h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }} trash bin regularly.
Entries.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/CarolineName}}'s place for aerobics club.

-{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}}
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...What's that? You want to build {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PamName}} a house? That's a great idea!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
Entries.Town_SeedShopSign:
- {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s General Store -
Now open 7 days a week From 9am-5pm!
Entries.Town_PickupTruck: It's just the back of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}}' old pickup truck...
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Cancelled_Krobus: You've changed your mind about kicking {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KrobusName}} out.
Entries.ManorHouse_DivorceBook_Filed_Krobus: You've decided to kick {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KrobusName}} out of the house. If you change your mind, come back here before night's end.
Entries.Caroline_Sunroom_Door: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/CarolineName}} only lets her friends enter here...

Entries.1:
...This is a book by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}.
 'Animals are very sensitive. They like to be pet every day, and prefer to eat grass outdoors than dry hay. They don't like being outside in the rain, though. Happy animals produce higher quality products!'
Entries.13:
Marriage Guide For Farmers
Before you ask someone to marry you, you'll have to date them for a while first (Ask someone to date you with a bouquet from {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s).
 When you're ready to pop the big question, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Everyone knows what it means when you present them with one of those.
 It's rumored that on stormy days, the ghost of an old mariner appears in Stardew Valley, clutching just such a pendant.
 After the wedding ceremony, your partner will move in with you. Remember to treat your spouse well... They still like gifts even after marriage!
 
(Paid for by {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}})
Entries.17:
...Saw something weird in the tunnel leading out from Pelican Town. There's a little door hidden in the dark. Couldn't get it open, though.

-{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GuntherName}}
Entries.18: Note From {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GuntherName}}: Wow, this library has really become great, thanks to your help! Thanks a bunch!

Entries.MagicInkDescription: You've found the {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}'s lost {0}! Better return it to h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}.

Entries.Event.cs.1068: Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} charged me {0}g for the hospital visit.
Entries.Event.cs.1070: I have no money, but {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} was obligated to save my life free of charge.
Entries.Event.cs.1584: Your grange display has been judged. Return to Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} for the result!
Entries.Event.cs.1597: Wow, I got a low score. I guess Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} isn't much of a fish man. Oh well...$s
Entries.Event.cs.1761: ...You're right. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}}... Ugh, God... I'm a horrible, *hic*... selfish person.$7#$b#Now I feel even worse...$7
Entries.Farmer.cs.1918: You received 15 Parsnip Seeds!^^'Here's a little something to get you started.^-Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}}'
Entries.Game1.cs.3180: Nothing happens. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}} said something about 'infusing it with the power of Yoba'.
Entries.NPC.cs.3990: A human visitor? This is most unusual...#$e#I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KrobusName}}, merchant of rare and exotic goods.
Entries.GameLocation.cs.8525: Come back when {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}'s tending the shop.
Entries.ShopMenu.cs.11508: *sigh*... When the door opened I thought it might be {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}}.
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12055: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my dear. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?
Entries.MultiplayerUtility.cs.12488: Your grange display has been judged. Return to Mayor {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LewisName}} for the result!
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13228: The local {0} population is starting to threaten other species. If you can fish {1} of them for me, it would be a big help.   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}}
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13248: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fisherman who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}}
Entries.FishingQuest.cs.13251: Trying to keep the art o' fishing alive... I'll pay {0}g to any fishing enthusiast who catches {1} {2}. Good luck!  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/WillyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13311:
Greetings! {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} here. Could someone please bring me {0}?
I'm studying them as part of my biological research.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13314: Looking to dissect {0}. Please deliver to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13317: Howdy neighbors! My goats are really hankerin' for {0}. I can't find any myself! Help?     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13320: Howdy neighbors! I want to try giving my cows {0} to increase their milk production. If you find one could you swing it by for me?.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13324: Feeling gloomy... {0} might cheer me up.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13327: ...feel like throwing {0} as hard as I can against the mountain face. Please deliver to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13378:
Feeling gloomy... {0} might cheer me up.
     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13381: ...feel like {0} for some reason. Please bring to {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SebastianName}} at 24 Mountain Road.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13446: A paste of fresh {0} makes a wonderful tonic for {1}. If you find one, I could put it to good use.       -Dr. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13462: Hi! I need {0} for a new appetizer I'm thinking about. Drop one off at the saloon and I'll be very grateful.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GusName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13473: Hello, it's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}. I'd like to buy {0} from someone, to craft into some fine jewelry. Thanks!
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13476: Looking for {0} to make into buttons for a dress I'm making. If you find one could you bring it to me?.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13546: I require {0} for potion-making. Please deliver directly to my study.     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/IncompleteName:{{RasmodiusFirstName}}1}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RasmodiusName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13548: The {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/IncompleteName:{{RasmodiusFirstName}}1}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RasmodiusName}}, wishes to study the arcane properties of the {0}. You will be rewarded.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13553: Local {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }} }} in search of a fresh {0}.
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13557: I will < you forever if you bring me {0}!     -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13560: Looking for a handsome young man to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13563: FOR GIRLS ONLY: psst... I need {0}... you know what it's for. Keep it secret, okay?      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13568: Need {0} for a project I'm working on.    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13580: Need {0} for my latest project. Help!    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13583: I need {0} to power my latest invention. It's the ONLY thing that will work!       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13593: I want to pull a prank on my {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Dad:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}. I'll need {0}. Keep it secret :)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}}
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13647: I am looking for someone to bring me {0} {1}s{2}    -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13674: Hello! It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RobinName}}. Could someone bring me {0} pieces of {1}? They need to be fresh... that means gathered today. Thanks!
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13688: - You can keep the ores after {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}} inspects them.
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13747: An invasive crab species is living in the local mine, threatening the native wildlife! These creatures are known for disguising themselves as stones. I'll pay someone to slay {0} of them.  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/DemetriusName}}
Entries.SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing the elemental balance into disarray. I would like an adventurer to enter the mines and slay {1} of these {2}.  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/IncompleteName:{{RasmodiusFirstName}}1}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/RasmodiusName}}, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Rasmodius}} }}
Entries.SocializeQuest.cs.13786: Hey! Will someone say 'Hi' to everyone in town for me? I want to spread a message of {0} today!   -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}
Entries.KrobusShopGone: I'm away. Please leave your payment in the box. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KrobusName}}

Entries.Event.cs.1625: Aw, I gotta put on that thight dress again? I thought now that we're married... Well, alright.$s
Entries.Event.cs.1815: She thought everyone forgot, but then you show up with a nice gift. What a good friend.
Entries.Event.cs.1820: Ahh... Indeed. I see you in a room, having a conversation with a lady.
Entries.Event.cs.1831: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1832: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Entries.Event.cs.1837: Hmmm... now what's this young lady's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Entries.NPC.cs.4437: I'm pregnant... can't you make your own breakfast?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4438: Ugh... I feel a little nauseated this morning.$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4440: {0}, we're going to have a baby soon.$l

Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and... well, wife!$h

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13571: I would like a cute boy to bring me {0}.  (^_-)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13574: Looking for a friend to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}

Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13571: Looking for a buddy to bring me {0}.       -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}
Entries.ItemDeliveryQuest.cs.13574: I would like a cute girl to bring me {0}.  (^_-)      -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}

Entries.AnimalShop.6: You rummage through {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}'s dresser. It's mostly long dresses, but there's a pair of brown suspenders in here as well.
Entries.AnimalShop.7: You dig around in {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MarnieName}}'s private drawer. There's nothing of interest.
Entries.AnimalShop.16: Doesn't seem like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JasName}} uses this much.
Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.2: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}'s locker. There's a frilly bathing suit inside.
Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.3: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AbigailName}}'s locker. It stinks pretty bad.
Entries.Blacksmith.2: You rifle through {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} mother.
Entries.Blacksmith.3: You rifle through {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of h{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/His:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Clint}} }} mother.
Entries.Blacksmith.4: Dear {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}},^I know you only think of me as a friend.^It's my fault. I'm too shy. I'll never have the courage to tell you the truth.^That's why I'm writing this letter to myself that I'll certainly crumple up and toss in the corner.
Entries.Blacksmith.7: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s quality anvil. It's made from an iridium alloy.
Entries.Blacksmith.8: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ClintName}}'s quality anvil. It's made from an iridium alloy.
Entries.ElliottHouse.2: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ElliottName}}'s work desk. It's covered in notes and crumpled papers.
Entries.ElliottHouse.4: It looks like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ElliottName}} is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!
Entries.ElliottHouse.6: It looks like {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/ElliottName}} is trying to grow a bonsai tree. It looks cool so far!
Entries.HaleyHouse.2: You quickly peek into {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}'s private dresser. It's stuffed with clothes.
Entries.HaleyHouse.3: You quickly peek into {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HaleyName}}'s private dresser. It's stuffed with clothes.
Entries.HaleyHouse.6: There's a little note on the pot. 'Something to remember me by. -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SandyName}}'
Entries.HaleyHouse.8: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/EmilyName}}'s computer. It's password-protected so you can't snoop around on it.
Entries.Hospital.3: It's probably not a good idea to stick your hands in there. It's full of used syringes, dirty swabs, and little nozzles that {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/HarveyName}} stuck into people's ears.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}e needs a family, something stable. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }}e's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}'s gridball helmet. Looks like {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Alex}} }} }}e keeps it polished.
Entries.LeahHouse.2: It's a stack of {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LeahName}}'s paintings. It's mostly landscapes and studies of nature.
Entries.LeahHouse.5: It's a wooden sculpture {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/LeahName}}'s working on. It has a wonderful cedar smell.
Entries.ManorHouse.3: Won't you come by tomorrow night?^If you come through the back window no one will notice.^I'd like to see you more often.^I know you're busy but can't you make time for me?^I hope to see you tomorrow.^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/IncompleteName:{{MarnieName}}1}}
Entries.SamHouse.3: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/JodiName}}-^Since I'll be coming home soon I want to tell you a few things.^I might not be the same man you remember. I've seen some things out here that have really shaken me up. I've been having a real hard time relaxing.^I don't want to scare you or make you upset. I just don't want you to be shocked when I get back.^Remember, no matter how I act, you and the kids mean everything to me.^I'll see you soon.^-{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/KentName}}
Entries.SamHouse.9: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s electric guitar. It has a pair of active pickups and a whammy bar.
Entries.SamHouse.10: --Report Card--^Name: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}^^Reading: C^Spelling: D^Math: C^Social Studies: B-^Art: B-^Sports:A^^Note:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentNickname}} is a good {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Boy:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}, but {{lowercase:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Vincent}} }} }}e could make do with a little more studying!^  -{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PennyName}}
Entries.SamHouse.11: It's {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/SamName}}'s computer. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Sam}} }}e's got an extensive library of computer games.
Entries.SamHouse.12: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/VincentName}}'s toys are strewn about the room.
Entries.ScienceHouse.2: For a gadgeteer, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s computer is pretty old. She's still backing up her files to floppy disk.
Entries.ScienceHouse.7: It's some kind of device {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MaruName}}'s working on. It looks pretty scrappy.
Entries.SeedShop.9: To M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Pierre}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/PierreName}}:^It pains me to be the bearer of bad news, but I feel obligated to inform you of a recent development most threatening to your livelihood.^Joja Co. has decided to expand into Pelican Town.^It's too late for protest. Joja Builders have already broken ground for the new JojaMart.^^This must be devastating news for you. So many years in business...a local standby... and now, obscured by the shadow of a powerful, efficient, economically viable corporation. What a shame!^^As manager of the new JojaMart, I feel, to some degree, personally responsible for your predicament. As such, I'd like to offer you a position as Assistant Grocer. Wages start at 5g an hour. I look forward to seeing your resume!^^-M{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Mr:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Morris}} }}. {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/MorrisName}}, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
Entries.WitchHut.5: Curse The Countryside!... A Spellbook For The Rural {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Wizard:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Witch}} }}
Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GilName}} slept through the whole movie... typical.
Entries.MovieTheater_Marlon2: That was an interesting one... what'd you think, {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GilName}}?#$b#...{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/GilName}}?#$b#...{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/Gil}} }}e's out cold.

Entries.BathHouse_WomensLocker.1: {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}'s Locker... There's a bunch of pictures of bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}'s drawer. There's clothes, headbands, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into {{mardrest.ChangeDialoguesEn/AlexName}}'s drawer. There's clothes, headbands, and a box of gridball trading cards.
